#summary DWT function source for converting RTF XHTML to BBCode

= Introduction =

Contains functions which render a ComponentField using the uiltInFunctions.RenderComponentField(string, int) function and converts that to Netbiscuits BBCode.

= Version =

This functions source is created and tested on SDL Tridion 2011 (including HR1). As it is using the Modular Templating model, it should work from versions `R5.3` and up.
